entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to a few rain showers in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
